title: Are clubs still bugged
body: I have my own club with 9 members in it but I can't view it or anything on the client (Old and New). But I can see it on the LoL Friends app.

replies.body: Yup, there are still issues going on with clubs atm. We're working on finding a fix that should resolve this for most players. I can't provide an ETA on that fix, but let me know if you have any questions.
Yes they appear to still be bugged. I don't have access to the club I own, but I do have access to the one I'm not the leader of.
